lead_paragraph: Fred Davis, a top adviser and creative director to Senator John McCain’s 2008 presidential campaign, laid out his vision for overhauling Mr. Trump in a memo last month to Mr. Trump’s campaign manager. The pitch was as far as things went: Mr. Davis now advises Gov. John Kasich of Ohio, another likely Republican presidential candidate.

headline.main: A Memo for a Vision on How to Overhaul Donald Trump
